text: Min̄cu avara dr̥ṣṭigaḷannu kittukoḷḷuvudō embantide. Adu avara munde beḷagidāgalella avaru adaralli (ā beḷakinalli) naḍeyatoḍaguttāre. Matte avara mēle kattalu kavidāga avaru nintu biḍuttāre. Allāhanu bayasiddare, avara kēḷuva mattu nōḍuva sāmarthyavannu kittukoḷḷuttiddanu. Allāhanu khaṇḍita ellavannū māḍaballavanāgiddāne
